comments.author: examplens
comments.body: There are already several similar solutions, based on the preev.com idea. All sites offer at least the possibility of entering and calculating the value of a custom amount of Bitcoin. From that point of view, I don't see the usability of your website in particular. Also, how useful is the sound notification, for every price change of a few cents? This happens constantly, who really wants his browser to beep every few seconds?The live chart page is not loading, I don't know if it exists or if there is another problem.
